TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ConcurrentBag`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Concurrent.IProducerConsumerCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class ConcurrentBag(Of T) Implements ICollection, IEnumerable(Of T), IProducerConsumerCollection(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T)

generic <typename T> public ref class ConcurrentBag : System::Collections::Concurrent::IProducerConsumerCollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::ICollection
type ConcurrentBag<'T> = class interface IProducerConsumerCollection<'T> interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T> interface seq<'T> interface IEnumerable interface ICollection

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 要存储在集合中的元素的类型。

span.span: The type of the elements to be stored in the collection.

summary.span: 表示对象的线程安全的无序集合。

span.span: Represents a thread-safe, unordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包可用于存储对象时排序并不重要，并与不同的集，包支持重复项。Bags are useful for storing objects when ordering doesn't matter, and unlike sets, bags support duplicates. 是线程安全包实现，已针对同一个线程将会同时生成和使用包中的存储的数据进行优化。 is a thread-safe bag implementation, optimized for scenarios where the same thread will be both producing and consuming data stored in the bag. 接受 `null` 作为引用类型的有效值。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types. 有关详细信息，请参阅文章[常见问题： 是新并发集合的所有无锁定？](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2010/01/26/9953725.aspx)并行编程与.NET 博客中。For more information, see the entry [FAQ: Are all of the new concurrent collections lock-free?](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2010/01/26/9953725.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加和删除项:The following example shows how to add and remove items from a : [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system.collections.concurrent/concurrentbag/concbag.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/api/system.collections.concurrent/concurrentbag/concbag.vb)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可能从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 但是，通过一个接口访问成员实现，其中包括扩展方法不能保证是线程安全并可能需要由调用方同步。

span.span: However, members accessed through one of the interfaces the implements, including extension methods, are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.
Thread-Safe Collections

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 中包含的元素数。

span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的计数表示的包的内容当前快照。The count returned represents a moment-in-time snapshot of the contents of the bag. 其他线程可能会添加或删除项，您访问后，立即可以`Count`属性。It is possible that other threads might add or remove items immediately after you access the `Count` property.

span.span: Thread-Safe Collections

Public Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator(Of T)
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator<'T> override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator<'T>

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An enumerator for the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举表示的包的内容当前快照。The enumeration represents a moment-in-time snapshot of the contents of the bag. 它不反映对后对集合的任何更新调用。It does not reflect any updates to the collection after was called. 枚举器与读取的同时使用非常安全，并写入包。The enumerator is safe to use concurrently with reads from and writes to the bag.

span.span: Thread-Safe Collections
